name: Car The Transporter Simulation 3d game
description:
Car Transporter Simulation

You have time limit in each level. So what are you waiting for? Change your "Gears" to race and complete each level.
Do not crash into city traffic or bump pedestrians and run away. Police will arrest you and lock you in prison.
you are transporting dangerous or illegal drugs and guns with no questions asked.
This is something you never seen before in any chasing car games on mobile before!
Drive around in detailed 3d city during daylight in this transporter fueled 3d simulator.
This game is not for kids, road transporter amazing moter simulator game for mature guys and girls.

Key features:

- Dynamic Gameplay
- Graphics good
- Increasing difficulty
- 20 levels
